item.title: Los Angeles Times Owner Reveals He’s Taking Newspaper Public
item.description: Billionaire Patrick Soon-Shiong made the announcement in an interview with Jon Stewart on ‘The Daily Show.’

item.title: Los Angeles Times to Become Publicly Traded Company
item.description: The Los Angeles Times will become a publicly traded company, its billionaire owner Patrick Soon-Shiong announced on “The Daily Show.” “Whether you right, left, Democrat, Republican,
